inputs.name: additional_patient_ids
inputs.title: Additional Patient IDs
inputs.description: Comma separated list of Patient IDs that together with the Patient ID from the SMART App Launch contain all MUST SUPPORT elements.

inputs.name: implantable_device_codes
inputs.title: Implantable Device Type Code
inputs.description: Enter the code for an Implantable Device type, or multiple codes separated by commas. If blank, Inferno will validate all Device resources against the Implantable Device profile

inputs.name: bulk_token_endpoint
inputs.title: Backend Services Token Endpoint
inputs.description:
The OAuth 2.0 Token Endpoint used by the Backend Services specification
                        to provide bearer tokens.

inputs.name: bulk_client_id
inputs.title: Bulk Data Client ID
inputs.description: Client ID provided at registration to the Inferno application.

inputs.name: bulk_scope
inputs.title: Bulk Data Scopes
inputs.description: Bulk Data Scopes provided at registration to the Inferno application.

inputs.name: bulk_encryption_method
inputs.title: Encryption Method
inputs.description:
The server is required to suport either ES384 or RS384 encryption methods
                        for JWT signature verification. Select which method to use.

inputs.name: bulk_server_url
inputs.title: Bulk Data FHIR URL
inputs.description: The URL of the Bulk FHIR server.

inputs.name: group_id
inputs.title: Group ID
inputs.description: The Group ID associated with the group of patients to be exported.

inputs.name: bulk_timeout
inputs.title: Export Times Out after (1-600)
inputs.description:
While testing, Inferno waits for the server to complete the exporting task.
          If the calculated totalTime is greater than the timeout value specified here,
          Inferno bulk client stops testing. Please enter an integer for the maximum wait time in seconds.
          If timeout is less than 1, Inferno uses default value 180.
          If the timeout is greater than 600 (10 minutes), Inferno uses the maximum value 600.

inputs.name: lines_to_validate
inputs.title: Limit validation to a maximum resource count
inputs.description: To validate all, leave blank.

inputs.name: bulk_patient_ids_in_group
inputs.title: Patient IDs in exported Group
inputs.description:
Comma separated list of every Patient ID that is in the specified Group. This information is
          provided by the system under test to verify that data returned matches expectations. Leave blank to not
          verify Group inclusion.

inputs.name: bulk_device_types_in_group
inputs.title: Implantable Device Type Codes in exported Group
inputs.description:
Comma separated list of every Implantable Device type that is in the specified Group. This
          information is provided by the system under test to verify that data returned matches expectations. Leave
          blank to verify all Device resources against the Implantable Device profile.

inputs.name: token_revocation_attestation
inputs.title: Prior to executing test, Health IT developer demonstrated revoking tokens provided during patient standalone launch.

inputs.name: single_patient_registration_supported
inputs.title: Health IT Module demonstrated support for application registration for single patients.

inputs.name: multiple_patient_registration_supported
inputs.title: Health IT Module demonstrated support for application registration for multiple patients.

inputs.name: resource_authorization_gui_supported
inputs.title: Health IT Module demonstrated a graphical user interface for user to authorize FHIR resources.

inputs.name: offline_access_notification_supported
inputs.title: Health IT Module informed patient when "offline_access" scope is being granted during authorization.

inputs.name: refresh_token_period_attestation
inputs.title: Health IT Module attested that refresh tokens are valid for a period of no shorter than three months.

inputs.name: token_validation_support
inputs.title: Health IT developer demonstrated the ability of the Health IT Module / authorization server to validate token it has issued.

inputs.name: information_accuracy_attestation
inputs.title: Tester verifies that all information is accurate and without omission.

inputs.name: multi_patient_scopes_attestation
inputs.title: Information returned no greater than scopes pre-authorized for multi-patient queries.

inputs.name: developer_documentation_attestation
inputs.title: Health IT developer demonstrated the documentation is available at a publicly accessible URL.

inputs.name: jwks_cache_attestation
inputs.title: Health IT developer confirms the Health IT module does not cache the JWK Set received via a TLS-protected URL for longer than the cache-control header indicates.

inputs.name: patient_suffix_attestation
inputs.title: Health IT developer demonstrates support for the Patient Demographics Suffix USCDI v1 element.

inputs.name: patient_previous_name_attestation
inputs.title: Health IT developer demonstrates support for the Patient Demographics Previous Name USCDI v1 element.

inputs.name: native_refresh_attestation
inputs.title: Health IT developer demonstrates support for issuing refresh tokens to native applications.
